Source.Name: cinnamon
Source.Summary: A Linux desktop featuring a traditional layout, built from modern technology and introducing brand new innovative features
Source.Description: Cinnamon is a Linux desktop which provides advanced innovative features and a traditional user experience. The desktop layout is similar to Gnome 2 with underlying technology forked from Gnome Shell. Cinnamon makes users feel at home with an easy to use and comfortable desktop experience.
